content: Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. I mean you said, you feel pretty confident to have 20% plus revenue and then you said smartphone is weak but because you make for 5G, OLED and 4G TTDI the add for you actually, I guess you mean it's not that big, as much as OLED and 5G volumes are growing. Thank you very much.
